SEARCH
Package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils

Class QBPUtils

java.lang.Object
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils.QBPUtils
public class QBPUtils extends Object
This class supports construction of an HL7 QBP Message following the CDC HL7 Version 2.5.1 Implementation Guide for Immunization Messaging from HTTP GET parameters retrieved using ServletRequest.getParameters() or from a map of Strings to a list of Strings. NOTE On HAPI DatatypeException and HL7Exception: The HAPI V2 code is pervasive with these checked exceptions due to message validation capabilities. Well written HAPI code is unlikely to encounter them. As a user of this library, instead of catching the error wherever it occurs, you can just simply wrap a whole method that uses it in a try/catch block.
Author:
Audacious Inquiry
See Also:
  • CDC HL7 Version 2.5.1 Implementation Guide for Immunization Messaging

    • addRequestParamsToQPD

      public static IzQuery addRequestParamsToQPD(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.v251.message.QBP_Q11 qbp, Map<String,String[]> map, boolean isPatient) throws ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception
      Add the FHIR Search Request Parameters to the QBP Message.
      Parameters:
      qbp - The QBP message to update
      map - A map such as that returned by ServletRequest.getParameters() containing the request parameters
      isPatient -
      Returns:
      The updated QPD Segment
      Throws:
      ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception - If an error occurs

    • addParamsToQPD

      public static IzQuery addParamsToQPD(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.v251.message.QBP_Q11 qbp, Map<String,List<String>> map, boolean isPatient) throws ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception
      Add the FHIR Search Request Parameters to the QBP Message.
      Parameters:
      qbp - The QBP message to update
      map - A map similar to that returned by ServletRequest.getParameters() containing the request parameters, save that arrays are lists. NOTE: Only patient.identifier can be repeated.
      isPatient - True if the request is for the Patient resource
      Returns:
      The updated QPD Segment
      Throws:
      ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception - If an error occurs

    • addRepetition

      public static ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type addRepetition(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment segment, int fieldNo) throws ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception
      Return the first repetition if it is empty, or create a new repetition at the end.
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment
      fieldNo - The field
      Returns:
      An empty repetition of the field
      Throws:
      ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception - If an error occurs

    • addRepetition

      public static <T extends ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type> T addRepetition(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment segment, int fieldNo, Class<T> theClass) throws ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception
      Add a repetition of the field, with the given type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the field
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment containing the field
      fieldNo - The field number
      theClass - The class for the type
      Returns:
      The requested field
      Throws:
      ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception - If an error occurs

    • addRepetition

      public static ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type addRepetition(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment segment, int fieldNo, int rep) throws ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception
      Add a repetition of the field at the specified position
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment
      fieldNo - The one-based field number
      rep - The repetition number (zero-based)
      Returns:
      The new field.
      Throws:
      ca.uhn.hl7v2.HL7Exception - If an error occurs
